verses.text: Happy \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* eat \w what|strong="H2896"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* toiled \w for|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H2896"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* \w happy|strong="H2896"\w* \w and|strong="H2896"\w* prosperous!

\w Like|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fruitful|strong="H6509"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5439"\w* wife \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* \w innermost|strong="H3411"\w* \w room|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5439"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: \w your|strong="H5439"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* shoots, \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w your|strong="H5439"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*.
